plot: On their wedding night she finds out that he married her for money (which is not true), there follows a series of misunderstandings when they each try to "see other people" during their honeymoon. With Mauricio Garces as the other guy.
title: Perdóname mi vida
plot_es: On their wedding night she finds out that he married her for money (which is not true), there follows a series of misunderstandings when they each try to "see other people" during their honeymoon. With Mauricio Garces as the other guy.
